PageWidgetPortable.Title: Solicitação >> Cadastro de solicitações
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_INT_CONSULTAR_SOLICITACOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <DefaultFilterName>Pesquisar por</DefaultFilterName> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.SOLICITACAO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM CP_SOLICITACOES WHERE SOLICITANTE = @USUARIO)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalInterno/e/Suprimentos/Solicitacao/VisualizarSolicitacao.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
